## DisabledFilter interface

Represents an unselected facet filter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DisabledFilter 
```

## Remarks

This should be used to indicate that a facet filter option is not selected.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [disabled](./answers-core.disabledfilter.disabled.md) | true | Indicates that the filter is disabled. |
|  [fieldId](./answers-core.disabledfilter.fieldid.md) | string | The fieldId to apply the filter against. |
